name: brine
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has less than half its max HP remaining, this move has double power.
short_effect: Has double power against Pokémon that have less than half their max HP remaining.

flavor_text.x_y: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.
